Commands.name: play
Commands.description: Starts playing the first result of the query or link

Commands.name: shuffle
Commands.description: Randomly shuffles the remaining songs in the queue

Commands.name: remove
Commands.description: Removes the song from the queue at [index]

Commands.name: volume
Commands.description: Sets the volume to [v]% (must be between 0% and 200%)

Commands.name: stop
Commands.description: Stops the currently playing song, clears the queue, and disconnects from voice

Commands.name: settopic
Commands.description: Sets Modis to update this channel's topic with the currently playing song

Commands.name: cleartopic
Commands.description: Stops Modis from updating this channel's topic with the currently playing song

Commands.name: destroy
Commands.description: Stops and removes the music player

Commands.name: front
Commands.description: Moves the music player to the front of the channel the command was sent from

Documentation: To see all commands, go to the [Music Module Documentation](https://infraxion.github.io/modis/documentation/modules/music/)
About: music plays videos and playlists from YouTube, and music files stored on the internet.
